function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Habitat degradation and fragmentation","Impact":"Decline and alteration of habitats, formation of new habitats, destruction of highly diverse habitats, displacement of populations, accessibility of natural resource extraction opportunities.","Mitigation":"Conservation efforts, sustainable land use planning, rehabilitation of degraded habitats, conflict resolution, zoonotic disease prevention.","Technologies":"GIS mapping, remote sensing, habitat monitoring systems, land-use modeling, conservation drones.","People":"Wildlife, displaced populations, communities in conflict areas, workers in natural resource extraction.","Owner":"Conservation organizations, governments, local communities, wildlife protection agencies."}]}
